glosses: in vain, pointlessly, to no purpose, for no good reason

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish توكللی (tevekküllü, tevekkeli) or توكلی (tevekkeli, “(originally) In reliance on God; trusting to chance, haphazardly”), from Arabic تَوَكُّل (tawakkul), verbal noun of تَوَكَّلَ (tawakkala, “to rely on, to trust entirely in, especially God”).
